Package com.quantcomponents.core.calendar

Interface Summary
ITradingCalendar Trading calendar entity.
ITradingCalendarManager Service that provides trading calendars by name
ITradingDay Specification of a trading day, in terms of uninterrupted trading periods
ITradingPeriod Specification of an uninterrupted trading period, in terms of hour and minute based in the relevant calendar's time zone
ITradingSchedule Provides a measure of time in terms of trading hours.
 

Class Summary
AbstractPeriodicTradingCalendar Base class for periodic trading calendars.
BankHoliday Utility class for emtpy trading days
CalendarTradingSchedule Adapter from ITradingCalendar to ITradingSchedule
FlatCalendar Trivial trading calendar, with a continuous trading period every day, weekend included.
LinearTradingSchedule Trivial trading schedule based on a continuous trading period each day.
PeriodicTradingCalendar Configurable implementation of AbstractPeriodicTradingCalendar
